24. If a vehicle is approaching with high beams, drivers should look __________ until the vehicle passes.
column4: to the left of the road

column2: 25. Defensive driving is a driving technique in which you as a driver:
column4: defend yourself against accidents by following close to the vehicle ahead.
column6: defend against poor drivers by getting ahead of them in traffic.
column8: identify dangerous driving situations and take action to avoid an accident.
column10: defend against accidents by driving your vehicle fast enough to stay ahead of traffic congestion.
